senses.sense_definition: An alternative form of <w>donatory</w>; a person to whom a gift or donation is made.

examples.text: The legal documents clearly identified the <w>donatary</w> who would receive the estate.
As the <w>donatary</w>, she was responsible for paying the taxes associated with the gift.

senses.sense_definition: A colonial official or captain in the Portuguese Empire who was granted a captaincy and extensive administrative powers over a territory.

examples.text: The king appointed a <w>donatary</w> to govern the newly discovered coastal region.
Each <w>donatary</w> was expected to settle the land and defend it against foreign invaders.
